testcase.classname: Perform Login action on the homepage for an existing user using login details and check the validation.
testcase.name: To check whether Login is successful with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Home Page..................................................passed When User enters his valid Username and valid Password......................passed Then Login Successful.......................................................passed

testcase.classname: Perform Login action on the homepage for an existing user using login details and check the validation.
testcase.name: To check whether validation is working with right username but wrong password
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Home Page..................................................passed When User enters his valid Username and invalid Password....................passed Then Login is unsuccessful..................................................passed

testcase.classname: Perform Login action on the homepage for an existing user using login details and check the validation.
testcase.name: To check whether validation is working with wrong username but right password
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Home Page..................................................passed When User enters his invalid Username and valid Password....................passed Then Login is unsuccessful..................................................passed

testcase.classname: Perform Login action on the homepage for an existing user using login details and check the validation.
testcase.name: To check whether validation is working with wrong username and wrong password
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Home Page..................................................passed When User enters his invalid Username and invalid Password..................passed Then Login is unsuccessful..................................................passed
